LANGUAGE.description: Button that indicates the current language of the program, represented by a flag

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_FULLSCREEN.description: Located in the upper right corner, enlarges the window across the entire screen

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_RESTORE.description: Same button as Fullscreen, restores the window to it's previous dimension

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_MINIMIZE.description: Located in the upper right corner, reduces the window to a small title and hide its contents

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_ABOUT.description: Located in the help menu, displays informations about the application

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: Tool for project management and task management

WORKSPACE_BOARD_CONNECT.message: Select a device to connect to

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_LIBRARY.description: Button that opens a modal with all the projects, with a folder icon as pictogram

WORKSPACE_STATUS_DISCONNECTED.description: Status of a device that is not connected.

WORKSPACE_STATUS_CONNECTED.description: Status of a device that is connected.

WORKSPACE_STATUS_SYNCHRONIZING.description: Status of a device that is synchronizing.

WORKSPACE_STATUS_CONNECTING.description: Status of a device that is connecting.

WORKSPACE_STATUS_ERROR.description: Status of a device that has an error.

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.message: Are you sure you want to exit?
WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.description: Select if you are sure you want to exit

EXIT.description: A button with the text exit

WORKSPACE_SET_MODE_ADVANCED.description: The menu to set the editor in advanced mode

WORKSPACE_SET_MODE_SIMPLE.description: The menu to set the editor in simple mode

ABOUT_DEVELOPED_BY.description: Text for authors of Wyliodrin Studio

WORKSPACE_DEVICE_SETUP_TEXT.message: You might want to set up some devices. For more information, please go to our tutorials website.
WORKSPACE_DEVICE_SETUP_TEXT.description: The message the user gets if there are no devices available in the connection selection

WORKSPACE_DEVICE_SETUP.description: The devices setup button for the setup website

WORKSPACE_DOCUMENTATION.description: Open a new window with the documentation of Wyliodrin STUDIO

ABOUT_VERSION.description: The text version that appears in the Welcome and About dialogs

OK.description: Any button that has the OK text

BACK.description: Any button that has the BACK text
